var render = function render() {
  var _vm = this,

        [

            "b-row",
            [
              _c("b-col", { staticClass: "text-center" }, [
                _c(

                  [

                    _c("b-icon", {
                      attrs: { scale: "1", icon: "suit-heart-fill" },
                    }),
                  ],
                  1
                ),

              ]),
            ],

          ),
          _vm.myWishlist.length == 0
            ? _c(

                [
                  _c("b-col", [
                    _vm._v(" Liste de souhaits est vide .. "),
                    _c("hr"),
                  ]),
                ],

              )
            : _vm._e(),
          _vm.myWishlist.length != 0
            ? _c(
                "b-row",
                _vm._l(_vm.myWishlist, function (wishItem) {
                  return _c(
                    "b-col",
                    { key: wishItem.id, attrs: { cols: "6" } },
                    [
                      _c(
                        "b-card-group",
                        { attrs: { deck: "" } },
                        [
                          _c(
                            "b-card",
                            { staticClass: "mb-4", attrs: { "no-body": "" } },
                            [

                                { attrs: { "no-gutters": "" } },
                                [

                                    { attrs: { md: "6" } },

                                        attrs: {
                                          src: wishItem.Product.image1,
                                          alt: "Image",
                                        },
                                        on: {
                                          click: function ($event) {
                                            return _vm.$router.push({
                                              path: `/product/${wishItem.Product.id}`,
                                            })
                                          },
                                        },
                                      }),
                                    ],
                                    1
                                  ),
                                  _c("b-col", { attrs: { md: "6" } }, [
                                    _c(
                                      "div",
                                      { staticClass: "m-3" },
                                      [
                                        _c(
                                          "b-link",
                                          {
                                            attrs: {
                                              to: `/product/${wishItem.Product.id}`,
                                            },
                                          },
                                          [
                                            _vm._v(
                                              " " +
                                                _vm._s(wishItem.Product.title) +
                                                " "
                                            ),
                                          ]
                                        ),
                                        _c("h6", { staticClass: "mt-2" }, [
                                          _vm._v(
                                            " Price: " +

                                              " " +
                                              _vm._s(
                                                wishItem.Product.currency
                                              ) +
                                              " "
                                          ),
                                        ]),
                                        _c(
                                          "b-row",
                                          {
                                            staticClass: "mt-2",
                                            attrs: { "align-v": "center" },
                                          },
                                          [
                                            _c(
                                              "b-col",
                                              [
                                                _c("b-form-rating", {
                                                  attrs: {
                                                    precision:
                                                      Math.round(
                                                        wishItem.Product.rating
                                                      ) ==
                                                      wishItem.Product.rating
                                                        ? 0
                                                        : 1,
                                                    size: "sm",
                                                    readonly: "",
                                                    "show-value": "",
                                                    "show-value-max": "",
                                                    value:
                                                      wishItem.Product.rating,
                                                    variant: "primary",
                                                  },
                                                }),
                                              ],
                                              1
                                            ),
                                          ],
                                          1
                                        ),
                                        _c(
                                          "b-row",
                                          { staticClass: "mt-2" },
                                          [
                                            _c(
                                              "b-col",
                                              [
                                                _c("AddToCart", {
                                                  attrs: {
                                                    buttonType: "sm",
                                                    addButtonTitle:
                                                      "Ajouter au chariot",
                                                    addedButtonTitle:
                                                      "Dans chariot",
                                                    productId:
                                                      wishItem.Product.id,
                                                    rating:
                                                      wishItem.Product.rating,
                                                    currency:
                                                      wishItem.Product.currency,
                                                    image:
                                                      wishItem.Product.image1,
                                                    title:
                                                      wishItem.Product.title,
                                                    amount:
                                                      wishItem.Product.amount,
                                                  },
                                                }),

                                                  staticClass: "mt-2",
                                                  attrs: {
                                                    addButtonTitle:
                                                      "Enregistrer",

                                                      "Enregistr√©",

                                                    productId:
                                                      wishItem.Product.id,
                                                  },

                                            ),

                        ],

                    ],

                }),

var staticRenderFns = []
render._withStripped = true

export { render, staticRenderFns }
